body.name: Micro Steam Iron, Travel Iron Mini with Steam, Mini Travel Iron for Clothes, Travel Mini Steam Iron, Portable Travel Steam Iron Mini Steamer for Dry & Wet Ironing.

features: 【2-in-1 Dry & Wet Ironing】 - Our portable mini steam iron offers both dry and wet ironing options, making it perfect for all your ironing needs. With a quick 60-second heat-up time, can be heated to 300°F. Plus, the water spray button helps you achieve a better ironing effect.

【Upgraded Titanium Panel】 - Our micro steam iron features a large titanium panel that heats up quickly and irons smoothly. It easily penetrates every fiber in your clothes, leaving them looking new and fresh. Even delicate fabrics can be ironed without damage.

【Pointed Curved Design】 - Our iron's front heating plate is designed with a pointed, curved tip that allows for easy ironing of narrow areas like buttons, collars, and cuffs. You'll get a perfect finish every time.

【80ML Transparent Water Tank】 - Our steam iron has an 80ml water tank that's easy to fill and won't leak. You can iron multiple pieces of clothing without having to refill the tank. Plus, the transparent design lets you keep an eye on the water level for added convenience and safety.

【Portable Iron for Home & Travel】 - Our mini steamer is perfect for ironing silk, plush, cotton, linen, and other fabrics. It's lightweight, compact, and easy to carry, making it ideal for travel or home use. You'll never have to worry about wrinkled clothes again!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2-in-1 ironing experience, can do spray mist of traditional ironing machine type wet ironing experience, can also with its titanium large panel do dry irons, meet the demand of personalized needs.The operation is simple and safe to use, after turning on the machine, turn on the spray to humidify the clothes. After the clothes are wet, turn off the spray button to start ironing.Hand-held iron can save space, light weight, compact design, portable size,It can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks, and can be easily carried anywhere,great for travelling on holiday or business.Exquisite flat ironing, clothes wrinkle removal,reproduce smooth and smooth Multi-dimensional restoration of clothing material sense, make clothing as beautiful as it first appeared.Heated panel at constant temperature of 300℉, ceramic sheet heating, ironing does not hurt clothes,can be used on silk, plush, wool, cotton, linen, polyester, nylon and so on.

30W Power Boost Pump pressure water supply, intelligent high-pressure steam technology, rapid heating and rapid wrinkle removal Upgrade Titanium Panel A large titanium panel, irons at a constant temperature of 300℉, quickly preheats, penetrate every fiber in the clothes easily so that the clothes can quickly recover as new. Pointed Curved Panel The heating plate is designed in a triangular tip shape, which allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, and collars.
Package Include: 1 x Micro Steam Iron 1 x Measuring Cup 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect travel size iron/steamer. Fits into carry on luggage without taking up much space and does the job! It got all the wrinkles out of my shirts and the steamer worked wonders on my sweaters!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this little contraption.
reviews.reviewText: The first time I used this. I had some doubts. Wow was I surprised. It heated up really fast and worked great. Will be using this, instead of always pulling out the big iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for on the go
reviews.reviewText: I do a lot of traveling and this is perfect! Small enough to fit in ANY bag and does exactly what it’s supposed to do. I always have a shirt or pants that are wrinkly and I just whip this out and it takes care of those wrinkles instantly. Love the size of it, the grip and the design. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this iron cuz it was travel size , it works great and still does the job , it came with a small little cup to put water in to fill it for steam .it would of been nice if it came with it's own travel bag or carrying case . But other than that it's great. price is right ,wish it came in other colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like the size and that it is not so heavy. You must firmly take the clothes that you are going to iron and it works perfectly. You must wait about 10 minutes for it to heat up. Very practical for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works like a full size, great for travel to steam or to iron, If you travel for work this is a must have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for on the go!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great two in one product for travel or on the go days.
